title: AG-UI Core Types
description: Core data structures used in the Agent User Interaction Protocol

RunAgentInput.description: Input parameters for running an agent

messages.description: List of messages in the conversation

tools.description: List of tools available to the agent

context.description: List of context objects provided to the agent

forwardedProps.description: Additional properties forwarded to the agent

Context.description: Contextual information provided to an agent

description.description: Description of what this context represents

Tool.description: Defines a tool that can be called by an agent

description.description: Description of what the tool does

parameters.description: JSON Schema defining the parameters for the tool

ToolCall.description: Represents a tool call made by an agent

id.description: Unique identifier for the tool call

function.description: Details about the function being called

FunctionCall.description: Function name and arguments in a tool call

name.description: Name of the function to call

arguments.description: JSON-encoded string of arguments to the function

State.description: Represents the state of an agent during execution. Can be any data structure.
